title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item in the view.

Observed Behavior (OB): On the first attempt to select an item, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected Behavior (EB): The second time I attempt to select the label, I am able to select it successfully.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item in the view, such as a label.
3. Notice that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.
4. Repeat step 2, and observe that on the second attempt, the label item can be selected successfully.
